channel.title: Knowledge on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Knowledge on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 26: Democratized Cognition
item.description: The printing press democratized text. Books spread beyond monasteries. Literacy became possible for people who would never have touched a manuscript. The information was out there, waiting for anyone who could read.

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 31: The Living Curriculum
item.description:
What does it mean to know a field?

Not to have read about it. Not to have studied it once. But to know it. To hold it in your mind as a living body of understanding that grows, shifts, updates, connects.
